data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Icewind Dale Portrait Pack
data.detailed_description:
Originally released in 2000, Icewind Dale is a Dungeons & Dragons game set in Wizards of the Coast's legendary Forgotten Realms. It featured many characters from the northernmost reaches of the Forgotten Realms and the icy tundra known as the Icewind Dale.

The new owner of this franchise, Beamdog, was founded by former Bioware employee Trent Oster and together with his team of developers and artists, have produced enhanced versions of the game that is now playable on modern computers, with enhanced graphics, new stories and more.

Not only has Beamdog brought the game forward for more people to enjoy worldwide, but they have also graciously allowed SmiteWorks to license and share some of the content for use by the Fantasy Grounds community. Now you get your chance to play your favorite characters from the Icewind Dale game inside your favorite virtual tabletop. These portraits can be used for any ruleset, so you can play them in Dungeons & Dragons fifth edition, or any other fantasy themed set. Grab a character sheet, grab a portrait and let the fun begin!

This Module Includes
  • 28 New Portraits from the Icewind Dale game, cropped and resized into 100x100 pixel portrait size
  • All portraits conveniently placed in a new IcewindDale portrait bag

Requirements: An active subscription or license of Fantasy Grounds. Any Ruleset

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配備:
  • 作業系統: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • 處理器: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • 記憶體: 1 GB 記憶體
  • 顯示卡: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: 版本：9.0c
  • 網路: 寬頻網際網路連線
  • 儲存空間: 500 MB 可用空間
  • 音效卡: n/a
  • 備註: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
建議配備:
  • 作業系統: Windows XP, Vista, 7x, 8x or 10x
  • 處理器: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • 記憶體: 4 GB 記憶體
  • 顯示卡: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: 版本：9.0c
  • 網路: 寬頻網際網路連線
  • 儲存空間: 2 GB 可用空間
  • 音效卡: n/a
  • 備註: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
